term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - energy resolution in radiochemistry
term.title: energy resolution

item.text: A measurement, at given energy, of the smallest difference between the energies of two particles or photons capable of being distinguished by a radiation spectrometer.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2519 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
